title: How I Learned Machine Learning from DeepSeek
description: In this article, I discuss my first experience in the AI domain and how I built my first Machine Learning model without a teacher or videos, using only an LLM named DeepSeek.

title: My Journey with Flutter: Building 10+ Apps
description: A personal reflection on my experience developing cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter, sharing key lessons learned and tips for new developers.

title: Building a Real-Time Face Detector
description: This post walks through the process of building a real-time face detection application using OpenCV and Python, covering the challenges and optimizations.
